appDescription: Create, manipulate, and understand geometric shapes interactively
selectShapeToViewMeasurements: Select a shape to view measurements
holdShiftToSnap15Degrees: Hold Shift to snap to 15° increments when rotating

circle.radius: The distance from the center to the edge of the circle.
circle.diameter: The distance across the circle through the center.
circle.perimeter: The distance around the circle, also called circumference.
circle.circumference: The distance around the circle, equal to 2πr or πd.

rectangle.width: The horizontal dimension of the rectangle.
rectangle.height: The vertical dimension of the rectangle.
rectangle.diagonal: The straight-line distance between opposite corners of the rectangle.

triangle.side1: The length of one of the sides of the triangle.
triangle.side2: The length of one of the sides of the triangle.
triangle.side3: The length of one of the sides of the triangle.
triangle.perimeter: The distance around the triangle (sum of all sides).
triangle.height: The perpendicular distance from a vertex to the longest side (used as base).
triangle.angles: The sum of the interior angles of a triangle is always 180 degrees.
triangle.angle1: The angle between side3 and side2. When one angle changes, the others adjust to maintain a sum of 180°.
triangle.angle2: The angle between side1 and side3. When one angle changes, the others adjust to maintain a sum of 180°.
triangle.angle3: The angle between side1 and side2. When one angle changes, the others adjust to maintain a sum of 180°.

line.length: The straight-line distance between the two endpoints.
line.angle: The angle the line makes with the horizontal axis, measured in degrees.

tooltips.lineExplanation: Calculates the straight-line distance between two points

clickOnCurveInstruction: Click on the curve to select a point and view its information.
